# Requirements

```{r requirements}
requirements=c("tidyverse","mice", "caTools", "corrplot", "summarytools", "plotly")

for (req in requirements){
  if (!require(req, character.only = TRUE)){
      install.packages(req)
  }
}
```

#Load the data

```{r}
str(train_data)

```
